ygData.subject: Re: Abominus
ygData.msgSnippet: Abominus slowly stopped pushing the ship, and stood upright, looking around. Who....speaks...? the monster slowly asked in confusion.

Abominus slowly stopped pushing the ship, and stood upright, looking
around. "Who....speaks...?" the monster slowly asked in confusion.
